trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Liberty
There were no other sightings in Liberty on or around August 18th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my front yard walking my puppy. (just west of Liberty) Noticed a bright fiery light to the north sky, gliding overhead and moving southbound. I didn't know what it was because it was gliding so fast and so fiery. It wasn't a plane or helicopter. It was silent........no noise. I lost sight when it went past the southern tree line.
Summary: Saw fireball to the north, it glided south, with no sound. Moved fairly quickly for low craft. It was so bright and low, my puppy barked at it.
